mapper.select: select COUNT(*) as grjnjszh from individualpay ip join unitinfo uf on ip.UnitInfoAccount=uf.UnitInfoAccount where uf.UnitInfoAccount=#{unitinfoaccount}
select ip.* from individualpay ip left join unitinfo uf on ip.UnitInfoAccount=uf.UnitInfoAccount where uf.UnitInfoAccount=#{unitinfoaccount}
